I'm not saying that all women impose strict conditions, but at least a minimum of respect is necessary. If she doesn't like it when you speak ill of their family, never do it again. She won't change her mind even if you fuck her like a god.

@eliomasullo NTR differs from real infidelities because NTR always puts the woman as submissive and «transformed» by the Fuckboy. In real life, women cheat on you when they want it and they put their conditions on the lover and he must respect its. A guy who treats her like a bitch is a fantasy that the NTR proposes like fanservice. In real life, if you don't respect her family or her conditions (availability), you don't fuck her.

@ThePeacerOuter Scooby doo(2)

Don't worry guys, it ends with her slipping up on the phone, husband finding out, filing for divorce and him taking custody of the kid while meeting someone new. She gets dumped by the boss for a new hire and has no one else in her life now. Happy ending! :D

I get why NTR is so popular in Japan since cheating, at least how many westerners interpret it, is already a social norm there. Adding conquest by cock turns it into NTR and is about the only way to escalate cheating. Throw in how being exposed cheating can ruin you socially and financially in Japan? Makes it fertile ground for porn but requires some really dumb plots, like this one, for it to be considered possible. Even to the actual writers creating it.
